issue.message: The getter return type (`P`) and setter parameter type (`Parcelable`) getter and setter methods for property `viewTag` should have exactly the same type to allow be accessed as a property from Kotlin; see https://android.github.io/kotlin-guides/interop.html#property-prefixes
The project references RTL attributes, but does not explicitly enable or disable RTL support with `android:supportsRtl` in the manifest
